page.title: 11Children in Bearwood (7)
page.content: We live in Bearwood and we like it here. We like Bearwood because it has lots of good things to do. There's a {swimming pool, a library, a sports {stadium, a park and some woods. We go to many other activities. Our school has a{playscheme}after school every evening. We go to{Girls Brigade, {Adventurers, Gymnastics, tap dancing {and Ballet. We like doing our mum's shopping because you get a chance to see your friends and teachers. Bearwood is a good place for young and old as there is something for everybody. We wish people would remember to put their{litter}in the bins and not let their{dogs}foul the pavements.
